content.description:
Start the same as

Defying Physics

, but instead of going up, traverse across the length of the wall. The crux is just how pumpy it gets.
content.protection: You could use a pad, but at that point, what are you doing with your life?
content.location: Walk around to the back side until you start to see walls that are made out of concrete walls with rocks. This specific wall is across Wesley Ave. on the Mudd Science Building. Start on the far right of the wall.

content.description: Start with your hands matched on a low rail. Bump up right hand then left. Heel hook the even lower rail, and reach with your left hand to an awesome pinch. After that, the rest is pretty easy with a large pinch just before the finish. See the picture for more detail. Try to use your feet on only holds you have used with your hands, since it will be too easy otherwise.
content.location: This is on the far right of the wall. See the picture.

pathTokens: Denver Metropolitan Area Bouldering and Buildering
